content: youtube tutorial https //youtu be/7frc27-cxmc si=uzae6atp6g9hbzvg **materials ** purse clasp mine was 16cm wide medium weight acrylic yarn in 2 colours i used soft classic solid yarn by loops and threads 100% acrylic 7oz/198g 354 yd/324m medium 4 - i used about 1/4 a ball of green and 1/4 a ball of brown a bit of cotton fabric if you choose to do a lining safety eyes mine are 16mm approx 2 feet of chain if you choose to add chain 4 5mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors needle and matching thread stitch markers
